attr.title: Lil Tanks
attr.desc: A side scrolling shmup where you are a prototype tank, defending humanity from the onslaught of alien lifeforms.
attr.inst: Purchase on Steam from Lead Money Games (https://store.steampowered.com/app/495820/Lil_Tanks/) Locate data.win file and place it into the gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase on Steam from [Lead Money Games](https://store.steampowered.com/app/495820/Lil_Tanks/) Locate data.win file and place it into the gamedata folder.
